textRun.content: This Markdown format organizes the 23 project ideas into detailed "Project Specification Cards." This structure is ideal for a bootcamp handbook or a GitHub repository readme, providing clear boundaries for each project while maintaining the "information-dense" requirements needed to challenge AI-assisted interns.
FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, Google Cloud, Docker, Temporal, Cloud Storage.
A B2B engine for urban FMCG distributors serving 10k+ Kirana stores with dynamic pricing and credit logic.
Solar Farm EPC & O&M Field Ops Suite
An industrial task orchestrator for engineering firms managing distributed solar assets across rural India.
A high-touch platform coordinating home-based palliative care involving doctors, nurses, and therapists.
A multi-lingual skilling platform for India’s blue-collar workforce, focusing on certification and placement.
A backend for managing multi-brand kitchens with unified inventory and 3rd-party aggregator sync.
A localized social network for Indian farmers with expert-verified advisory and geo-targeted alerts.
A specialized expense system for site supervisors to track cash-burn and vendor payouts in infra projects.
A platform for retail investors to buy 'slices' of high-yield commercial properties with monthly dividends.
A high-end platform for managing large-scale Indian weddings, vendor contracts, and milestone payments.
A recruitment backend for onboarding 1,000+ delivery partners daily, including BGV and training.
A specialized inventory system for temperature-sensitive drugs with batch-level IoT traceability.
A backend aggregating wearable data to calculate Health Scores that influence insurance premiums.
A mission-critical support system for a Neobank handling UPI failures and NPCI-linked timelines.
A digital repository for top-tier law firms handling litigation archives, case laws, and internal IP.
A B2B booking engine for IT firms to manage employee travel across partner hotels and guest houses.
A specialized CMS for pharma plants to manage Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) and FDA logs.
A real-time telematics system for electric 3-wheelers, optimizing for battery life and charging cycles.
A feedback system for automobile dealerships to track CSAT across Sales and Service milestones.
A SaaS platform for RWAs to manage monthly maintenance, water-meter billing, and facility subs.
A food ordering system for hospitals, mapping meals to patient medical records and dietetics.
A high-throughput notification engine for stock trading, handling volatility alerts and trade confirms.
A digital locker for developers and banks to manage project titles, encumbrances, and liens.
A marketplace for manufacturing plants to auction industrial waste to certified PCB-verified recyclers.
A specialized B2B catalog and ordering system for urban FMCG distributors serving 10,000+ Kirana stores with dynamic pricing and credit logic.

System must support SKU-level GST mapping (5%, 12%, 18%) with HSN-driven tax calculations and Cess. Implement distributor-specific 'Variable Pricing' where a store's rate depends on their loyalty tier and historical volume. Handle UOM (Unit of Measure) conversions between 'Crates', 'Cases', and 'Individual Units' with strict inventory locking during checkout. Temporal workflows should manage the 48-hour 'Credit-to-Cash' cycle, triggering automated reminders and hard-stops on ordering if outstanding dues exceed the store's credit limit.

Edge cases include 'Partial SKU Returns' during doorstep delivery where the invoice must be regenerated via Cloud Storage in real-time. Must handle 'Combo-mapping' where purchasing 10 cases of soap triggers a 'Free-SKU' of detergent, ensuring inventory is deducted for both. Validations must prevent 'Negative Inventory' during high-concurrency flash-sales of subsidized staples. Integrate with a third-party SMS gateway for OTP-based order confirmation at the point of delivery.
2. Solar Farm EPC & O&M Field Operations Suite
An industrial-grade task orchestrator for Engineering, Procurement, and Construction (EPC) firms managing distributed solar assets across rural India.

The system must manage 'Project-Phase-Activity' hierarchies with strict 'Predecessor-Successor' dependencies (e.g., cannot start Inverter Installation before Foundation Curing). Tasks must support Geo-fencing; field engineers can only 'Start' a task if their GPS coordinates are within 50 meters of the site. Implement complex SLA tracking for O&M (Operations & Maintenance) where 'Critical Fault' tickets must be acknowledged in 2 hours and resolved in 24 hours, or penalties are automatically calculated.

Temporal must be used to orchestrate 'Maintenance Sprints'—long-running workflows that pause for 3rd-party inspections and resume only after a PDF 'Fitness Certificate' is uploaded to Cloud Storage. Edge cases include 'Material Shortage Holds' where a task is paused, triggering a procurement sub-process. Requirements include multi-role RBAC for Client, Contractor, and Sub-contractor, with 'Approval Gates' for milestone-based invoicing. Handle intermittent connectivity by allowing 'Sync-later' state transitions for field logs.
A high-touch healthcare platform coordinating home-based palliative and geriatric care involving doctors, nurses, and physiotherapists.

System must manage 'Care-Plan' subscriptions rather than one-off bookings, involving recurring schedules with 'Primary' and 'Backup' practitioner assignments. Implement a 'Travel Buffer' algorithm that accounts for city-specific peak hour traffic (Bangalore/Mumbai) to prevent overbooking. Use Temporal to monitor 'Session Vitals'—if a nurse doesn't check-in via the app within 15 minutes of the scheduled time, an escalation workflow triggers a call to the supervisor.

Strict PII (Personally Identifiable Information) encryption is required for patient history and prescription PDFs stored in Cloud Storage. Business rules must enforce 'Medical Compatibility' checks (e.g., only a Nurse with 'ICU-certification' can be assigned to a Ventilator-patient). Handle 'Short-notice Cancellations' with a tiered refund logic (100% refund >24h, 50% <6h). Integrate with a 3rd party 'Tele-consult' API to seamlessly transition home visits to video calls if the practitioner is stuck in transit.
A multi-lingual skilling platform for India’s blue-collar workforce, focusing on certification and placement in logistics and manufacturing.

Support multi-tenant content delivery where courses are mapped to specific regional languages (Hindi, Marathi, Tamil, etc.) with localized metadata. Implement 'Video Progress Guardrails'—users cannot skip content, and periodic 'Liveness Questions' must be answered to continue. Temporal should manage the 'Certification Lifecycle', from proctored exam scheduling to the automated generation of a QR-coded PDF certificate stored on Cloud Storage.

Business logic must include 'Employer-sponsored seats' where a logistics firm buys 500 licenses and assigns them via bulk-upload (CSV processing). Requirements include 'Course-Prerequisite Trees' and 'Modular Credits' where completing Module A & B unlocks the 'Forklift Operator' exam. Edge cases include 'Resume-from-point' across different devices and handling spotty 4G connections during large asset downloads. Integration with 3rd party background verification (BGV) services for post-completion student profiling is essential.
A backend for managing high-volume, multi-brand cloud kitchens with unified inventory and 3rd-party aggregator (Swiggy/Zomato) sync.

Orchestrate 'Shared Inventory' across brands; if 'Brand A' uses the last 5kg of Paneer, 'Brand B's' Paneer-based SKUs must be auto-toggled to 'Out of Stock' across all channels. Implement a 'Kitchen Display System' (KDS) logic with 'Preparation Time Estimation' based on real-time order density. Temporal must handle the 'Order-to-Delivery' state machine, managing timeouts for 'Rider Not Assigned' and 'Preparation Delayed' alerts to the manager.

Requirements include 'Recipe-level Ingredient Costing' (COGS) which recalculates daily based on fluctuating market rates fetched via a 3rd party API. Constraints include 'Zero-waste batching' for pre-prepared items like gravies, which have a 6-hour expiry window tracked by the system. Edge cases involve 'Menu-subsetting'—certain items only available during specific hours or localized to specific kitchen hubs. Robust logging is required for 'Voided Orders' with mandatory 'Reason-Codes' and supervisor overrides.
A localized social network for Indian farmers to share crop insights, with expert-verified advisory and geo-targeted pest alerts.

Feed logic must be geo-contextual; a farmer in Vidarbha should see posts related to Cotton and Soyabean, prioritized by 'Proximity' and 'Crop-Stage'. Implement an 'Expert Verification' workflow where a government scientist can flag a post as 'Verified Advisory' or 'Misleading'. Use Temporal to trigger 'Climate-Alerts'—if a 3rd party weather API predicts unseasonal rain, broadcast a 'Harvest-now' notification to all farmers in that specific district.

Requirements include 'Image-based Search' integration for pest identification (using 3rd party ML API) and storing high-res crop images in Cloud Storage. Business rules must prevent 'Spamming' via rate-limits on post frequency and automated 'Sentiment Analysis' for community guidelines. Edge cases include 'Post-Translation' where a Marathi post is auto-translated for a Kannada neighbor. Constrain the 'Trending' algorithm to exclude non-agricultural content, ensuring the platform remains a niche utility tool.
A specialized expense management system for site supervisors in large-scale infrastructure projects to track cash-burn and vendor payouts.

System must enforce 'Project-Budget Head' constraints—supervisors cannot spend on 'Cement' if the monthly allocation is exhausted without a 'Change-Order' approval. Implement 'OCR-based Receipt Processing' (via 3rd party) to extract GSTIN, Date, and Amount from photos uploaded to Cloud Storage. Temporal workflows must handle the 'Multi-level Approval' chain: Site Mgr > Project Mgr > Finance Dept, with 48-hour auto-escalations.

Validations must check for 'GSTIN Authenticity' using a 3rd party verification API and flag 'Duplicate Invoices' across the entire company. Constraints include 'Cash-on-Hand' limits; a supervisor cannot hold more than ₹50,000 without reconciling previous expenses. Edge cases include 'Advance-to-Vendor' payments which remain as 'Open-items' until a final invoice is settled. Export functions must generate Tally-compatible XML/CSV files for direct import into corporate accounting systems.
8. Fractional Commercial Real Estate (CRE) Investment Platform
A platform for retail investors to buy 'Slices' of high-yield commercial properties (SEZ, Warehouses) with dividend distributions.

The system must handle 'Fractional Ownership' logic—splitting a single Property Asset into 10,000 tradable units with minimum-buy constraints. Implement 'KYC & AML' (Anti-Money Laundering) checks for every investor using 3rd party e-KYC integrations before allowing transactions. Temporal must manage the 'Dividend Distribution' workflow—calculating monthly rental payouts per share, deducting TDS (Tax Deducted at Source), and triggering bank transfers.

Requirements include 'Document Vault' for Title Deeds and Encumbrance Certificates stored in Cloud Storage with 'Investor-only' access. Business rules must manage 'Exit Windows'—investors can only list their units for resale during specific 15-day quarterly cycles. Edge cases include 'Inheritance Transfer' of units and 'Unallotted Fund Refunds' if a property funding goal is not met within 60 days. Integration with 3rd party 'ESign' (Aadhaar-based) for digital execution of co-ownership agreements is mandatory.
A high-end platform for managing large-scale Indian weddings, focusing on vendor contracts, milestone payments, and guest RSVPs.

The system must manage 'Vendor-Milestone' contracts where payments are released in stages (e.g., 20% on booking, 40% on layout approval, 40% post-event). Use Temporal to manage the 'Countdown-to-Event'—triggering reminders for guest list finalization, menu tasting, and vendor briefings. Implement a 'Guest Relationship' module that handles complex family-tree tagging and dietary preferences (Jain, Vegan, etc.).

Requirements include 'Budget Tracking' with real-time variance analysis (Estimated vs. Actual). Constraints include 'Vendor Overbooking'—the system must block a photographer's calendar across all managed weddings. Edge cases include 'Last-minute Venue Change' workflows that trigger mass SMS/WhatsApp notifications to 500+ guests via 3rd party API. Documents like 'Floor Plans' and 'Contract PDFs' must be version-controlled in Cloud Storage. Validations must ensure that total vendor commitments do not exceed the user's 'Max Budget' cap.
A specialized recruitment backend for on-boarding 1,000+ delivery partners daily, including document verification and training.

System must handle a 'Multi-stage Funnel': Lead > KYC > Training > Background Verification (BGV) > Asset Handover > Live. Integrate with 3rd party APIs for PAN/Aadhaar verification and 'Criminal Record Checks' via a BGV partner. Temporal should orchestrate the 'Onboarding Sprint'—if a candidate fails to upload their 'Driving License' within 4-hours of registration, an automated 'Nudge' sequence begins.

Business rules must enforce 'City-specific Compliance' (e.g., EV-only fleets for certain zones or age-limits). Store high-resolution photos of candidates and documents in Cloud Storage with time-bound access links. Edge cases include 'Re-activation' of blacklisted riders and 'Batch-hiring' for festival spikes where 5,000+ accounts must be provisioned in 24 hours. Validations must prevent 'Identity-duplication' where one person tries to create multiple accounts using different phone numbers but the same PAN.
A specialized inventory system for temperature-sensitive life-saving drugs (vaccines, insulin) with batch-level traceability.

System must implement 'FEFO' (First-Expiry-First-Out) logic and 'Batch-Hierarchy' where a single shipment can contain multiple 'Lots' with different expiry dates. Integrate with 3rd party IoT sensors to log 'Temperature Excursions'; if a batch exceeds 8°C for >30 mins, Temporal must trigger a 'Quarantine Workflow' and block its sale. Requirements include 'HSN-level Tax' and 'Drug License' validation for every B2B customer.

Constraints include 'Minimum Stock Alerts' at a per-warehouse level with automated 'Inter-depot Transfer' (IDT) suggestions. Edge cases include 'Product Recalls'—the system must be able to trace every single unit of a specific 'Batch ID' to the end-retailer within 60 seconds. Documentation for CDSCO compliance, including 'Audit Logs' of every inventory movement, must be immutable and exportable. Cloud Storage should be used for storing 'Certificate of Analysis' (CoA) for every batch, accessible to pharmacies.
A backend that aggregates activity data to calculate 'Health Scores' which directly influence corporate health insurance premiums.

System must integrate with multiple 3rd party wearables (Google Fit, Apple Health, Fitbit) to ingest daily step counts, sleep, and heart rate. Implement a 'Points-to-Premium' algorithm where achieving monthly goals reduces the 'Employee Contribution' to the insurance policy. Temporal must manage 'Challenge Seasons'—monthly gamified competitions with real-time leaderboards and 'Streak-maintenance' logic.

Business rules must include 'Anomaly Detection' to prevent 'Step-faking' (e.g., 50,000 steps in 1 hour). Requirements include 'Corporate-level Aggregation'—providing HR with anonymized data on 'Departmental Health' without violating individual privacy. Edge cases include 'Medical Exemptions' where a doctor’s note (uploaded to Cloud Storage) pauses a user’s streak requirements. Validations must ensure that 'Incentive Payouts' do not exceed the 'Corporate Reward Pool' budget for the quarter.
A mission-critical support system for a UPI/Neobank, handling transaction failures, chargebacks, and NPCI-linked timelines.

The system must link every ticket to a 'Transaction ID' fetched from the Core Banking System (CBS). Implement 'SLA-Driven Escalation'—as per RBI mandates, certain disputes must be resolved within T+2 or T+7 days, or the system triggers daily penalties. Use Temporal to manage the 'Chargeback Lifecycle', which involves waiting for 'Acquirer Bank' responses and 'Merchant Proof of Delivery' uploads.

Requirements include 'PII Masking' in logs and 'Role-based Data Masking' where support agents see only the last 4 digits of a card/account. Business rules must handle 'Auto-refunds' for known 'Technical Declines' while routing 'Suspected Fraud' to a specialized Risk Team. Edge cases include 'Mass-Outage Mode'—grouping 10,000 identical failure tickets into a single 'Incident' for bulk communication via 3rd party SMS/Push. Documentation for 'Internal Audit' (IA) must be automatically generated for every resolved dispute.
A digital repository and management system for a top-tier law firm, handling litigation archives, case laws, and internal IP.

System must support 'Full-text Search' indexing (via 3rd party) across thousands of PDF/DOCX case files stored in Cloud Storage. Implement 'Matter-level Billing'—every hour spent by an intern or associate on a specific 'Library Research' task must be logged and billable to a client. Temporal should manage 'Retention Policies'—automatically archiving files to 'Cold Storage' after 5 years and deleting them after 7 years per bar council norms.

Constraints include 'Chinese Wall' permissions—lawyers working on 'Client A' must not be able to search for files related to 'Client B' (competitor). Business rules involve 'Physical-Digital Sync'—tracking the location of original physical 'Deeds' in fireproof vaults vs. their digital scans. Edge cases include 'Court-ordered Sealing' where a 'Matter' must be instantly hidden from all users. Validations must prevent 'Document Deletion' without a 'Senior Partner's' multi-factor authorization.
A B2B booking engine for large IT firms to manage employee travel across 'Partner Hotels' and 'Internal Guest Houses'.

System must enforce 'Corporate Travel Policy'—employees of 'Grade 7' can only book hotels up to ₹4,500/night, while 'Grade 10' can go up to ₹8,000. Implement 'Project-code Tagging'—every booking must be linked to a billable project ID for 'Internal Cost-center' accounting. Temporal must manage the 'Approval Workflow'—if a booking is 'Out-of-Policy', it triggers a request to the Project Manager which expires in 4 hours.

Requirements include 'Direct-Bill' integration where the hotel sends the invoice to the company via the platform, including GST reconciliation. Constraints include 'Inventory Blocking'—certain rooms are permanently reserved for 'On-call' engineers. Edge cases include 'Extended-stay Proration' where the rate changes after 15 days of continuous stay. Store 'Employee IDs' and 'Visa/Passport Scans' (for international travel) in Cloud Storage with strict 'Expiry-based Deletion' once the trip is completed.
A specialized CMS for pharmaceutical manufacturing plants to manage 'Standard Operating Procedures' (SOPs) and CDSCO/FDA compliance logs.

System must support 'Version-Locked CMS'—once an SOP is 'Approved', it cannot be edited; any change requires a 'New Version' with a full 'Change-History' log. Implement 'Read-Receipt Compliance'—factory workers must 'Acknowledge' that they have read the new SOP via the app before they can log their shift. Temporal should manage the 'Periodic Review' cycle, alerting 'Quality Assurance' (QA) leads every 6 months to re-validate documents.

Requirements include 'Electronic Signatures' (21 CFR Part 11 compliant) for every document approval. Business rules must ensure 'Cross-linking'—an SOP for 'Machine A' must link to the 'Safety Guidelines' and 'Cleaning Logs'. Edge cases include 'Emergency SOP Override' during a plant failure, which must trigger a 'Critical Incident Report' to the management. All PDF exports must have 'Dynamic Watermarking' with the user's name and timestamp to prevent unauthorized leaks.
A real-time management system for an electric 3-wheeler fleet, optimizing for battery life, charging cycles, and driver shifts.

System must ingest 'Telematics Data' (via 3rd party MQTT/IoT hub) including GPS, SoC (State of Charge), and Battery Temperature. Implement a 'Battery-Swapping Algorithm'—when a vehicle's SoC drops below 20%, Temporal triggers a 'Swap-Station' reservation at the nearest hub. Requirements include 'Driver Payouts' based on 'Kilometers Driven' and 'Energy Efficiency' scores.

Constraints include 'Battery Health Monitoring'—if a battery's SOH (State of Health) drops below 70%, it must be 'De-commissioned' for solar-storage use. Business rules must handle 'Shift Handovers'—drivers cannot end a shift unless the vehicle is at a designated 'Hub' and plugged in. Edge cases include 'Vehicle Immobilization'—remotely disabling the EV in case of theft or non-payment of lease. Store 'Accident Photos' and 'Maintenance Logs' in Cloud Storage for insurance 'Claims Processing'.
A feedback system for high-ticket automobile dealerships to track 'Customer Satisfaction' (CSAT) across Sales and Service.

System must trigger 'Survey Workflows' via Temporal at specific intervals: T+2 days (Delivery), T+3 months (First Service), T+1 year (Insurance Renewal). Implement 'Sentiment Analysis' (via 3rd party API) on open-ended comments; if sentiment is 'Highly Negative', instantly trigger a 'Service Recovery' ticket for the 'General Manager'.

Requirements include 'Incentivized Feedback'—customers receive 'Loyalty Points' for completing surveys, redeemable for the next oil change. Business rules must prevent 'Survey Fatigue'—a customer should not receive more than one survey request every 90 days. Edge cases include 'Dealer-Incentive Payouts' being tied to 'Average CSAT' scores, requiring 'Audit-proof' data logs to prevent 'Survey Gaming' by staff. Store 'Audio Feedback' (recorded by advisors) in Cloud Storage with 'Automated Transcription' for quality monitoring.
A SaaS platform for Residential Welfare Associations (RWAs) to manage monthly maintenance, water-meter billing, and facility subs.

System must handle 'Tiered Utility Billing'—water consumption is billed at ₹X for first 10KL, ₹Y for next 10KL, and so on. Implement 'Late-Fee Logic'—automated compounding interest (e.g., 0.1% per day) if the 'Maintenance Bill' is not paid by the 5th of every month. Temporal must manage the 'Service Suspension' workflow—sending 3 warnings before 'Revoking' gym/pool access via the RFID gate system.

Requirements include 'Integrated Payment Gateway' with 'Split-Payouts'—the base maintenance goes to the RWA, but the 'Electricity Component' goes to the Utility Provider. Constraints include 'Pro-rated Billing' for tenants moving in/out mid-month. Edge cases include 'Bulk-Discounting' for residents who pay 12 months in advance. Store 'Digital NOCs' (No Objection Certificates) and 'Lease Agreements' in Cloud Storage with 'Audit-Trails' for the RWA auditor.
A specialized food delivery and ordering system for large hospitals, mapping meals to patient medical records and dietetics.

System must sync with the 'Hospital Information System' (HIS) to fetch 'Patient Diet Restrictions' (e.g., Low-Sodium, Diabetic-Friendly, Liquid-only). Implement a 'Dietitian Approval' gate—patients/relatives can order from a 'Curated Menu', but the order is only 'Pushed' to the kitchen after a 'Dietitian Check'. Temporal manages the 'Meal Timing'—ensuring 'Post-Op' patients receive meals exactly 2 hours after being cleared by the surgeon.

Requirements include 'Room-level Route Optimization' for the delivery staff to ensure food reaches 'Ward 5' while still hot. Constraints include 'Allergen Guardrails'—the system must 'Hard-block' any item containing 'Peanuts' if the patient profile flags an allergy. Edge cases include 'Patient Discharge'—instantly cancelling any 'Scheduled Meals' to prevent waste. All 'Meal-logs' must be stored for 'Nutritional Audit' in Cloud Storage to track patient recovery vs. calorie intake.
A high-throughput notification engine for a stock trading platform, handling volatility alerts, trade confirmations, and marketing.

System must support 'Priority-based Queuing'—a 'Margin-Call' (Liquidate now) alert must be delivered within 500ms, while a 'Market Wrap' newsletter can wait. Integrate with 3rd party providers for WhatsApp, SMS, Push, and Email with 'Fallback Logic'—if Push fails, send SMS. Temporal should manage 'Conditional Workflows'—if a user hasn't clicked a 'High-Risk Trade' notification within 2 mins, trigger an automated 'IVR Call'.

Business rules must include 'User-Preferences' at a granular level (e.g., 'Only SMS for trades > ₹1,00,000'). Implement 'Rate-limiting' per user to prevent 'Notification Fatigue' and spam. Edge cases include 'Batching'—if 50 stocks in a user's watchlist hit a price target, send one 'Digest' instead of 50 pings. Validations must ensure 'Regulatory Disclaimers' are appended to all financial advice notifications. Logs must be kept for 'Proof-of-Delivery' for all legal 'Contract Notes'.
A digital locker for real estate developers and banks to manage 'Project Title' documents, encumbrance certificates, and liens.

System must implement 'Hierarchical Document Access'—the 'Master Title Deed' is visible to the 'Lead Bank', but 'Sub-lease Deeds' are visible to 'Individual Home-buyers'. Use Temporal to manage the 'Lien Release' workflow—when a builder repays a loan, the 'Bank' must digitally 'Release' the document, triggering an update to the RWA.

Requirements include 'Blockchain-linked Hashing'—every document's hash is stored on-chain to prevent tampering of 'Property Maps' in Cloud Storage. Business rules must handle 'Expiry Alerts'—notifying the developer 90 days before a 'Building Permit' or 'Fire NOC' expires. Edge cases include 'Multi-party Signing'—a 'Sale Agreement' requiring signatures from 3 Directors and 2 Buyers via 3rd party e-Sign API. Validations must prevent 'Duplicate Property Registration' by checking 'Survey Numbers' against the existing database.
A marketplace for manufacturing plants to auction industrial waste (scrap metal, chemicals, plastics) to certified recyclers.

System must handle 'Reverse & Forward Auctions' with real-time 'Bid-management' and 'Auto-increment' logic. Implement 'Bidder-Qualification'—only recyclers with a valid 'Pollution Control Board' (PCB) license (verified via 3rd party API) can bid on 'Hazardous Waste'. Temporal must manage the 'Post-Auction Settlement'—handling payment escrow, 'Weigh-bridge Certificate' upload, and 'Lifting-Order' issuance.

Requirements include 'Quantity Variance'—the actual scrap loaded might be +/- 10% of the 'Estimated Weight'; the system must auto-adjust the final invoice. Constraints include 'Geo-restrictions'—certain waste types cannot be transported across state lines due to 'Inter-state Green-tax' rules. Edge cases include 'Bid-Retraction' penalties and 'Dispute Resolution' if the scrap quality doesn't match the photos in Cloud Storage. Integration with 3rd party 'Logistics-aggregators' to provide 'Freight-quotes' to the winning bidder is essential.
A B2B seller-side interface for urban Kirana networks to join the ONDC (Open Network for Digital Commerce) ecosystem, handling dynamic catalog discovery.
. Business logic must handle "Partial Availability" where a store has 10 items but can only commit 5 to ONDC due to physical footfall. Implement

(5%/12%/18%) and support "Cess" for specific tobacco/luxury goods. Temporal must manage the "Catalog Sync" workflow—if a store’s inventory CSV isn't updated in 24 hours, the node must auto-delist the seller to avoid SLA penalties.
Handling "Search-with-Location-Intent" where the catalog returned depends on the store’s 3km delivery radius. Validate
persistence across catalog updates to prevent broken links in the ONDC buyer apps.
A unified backend for a "House of Brands" cloud kitchen managing orders from Swiggy, Zomato, and Direct-Web channels simultaneously.
Implement a "Master Inventory" that deducts ingredients at the
(e.g., one Burger order deducts 1 bun, 50g patty, 10g lettuce). Integrate with
contracts; interns must mock the incoming Webhooks for

. Temporal must handle the "KDS (Kitchen Display System) Timer"—if an order isn't marked "Prepared" within the "Brand SLA" (e.g., 8 mins for Brand A, 15 mins for Brand B), trigger an escalation to the manager.
No order can be accepted if a "Critical Ingredient" (flagged in DB) is below the threshold.
Handle "Item Substitution" logic where the customer is called via a 3rd party IVR (mocked) if an item goes out-of-stock post-payment.
A digital-first pathology network backend compliant with India’s Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission (ABDM) for lab-report orchestration.
standards for health records. Implement the "Home Collection" workflow: Technician assignment based on "Geographical Clusters" to minimize travel. Temporal must manage the "Sample Lifecycle"—from
A report cannot be released without a "Digital Signature" from a MD Pathologist (MFA mock).
Support "Phlebotomist-Slot Locking" where a slot is held for 10 minutes during payment. Integration: Mock the
API for patient verification. Use Cloud Storage for storing encrypted PDF reports with a 7-year retention policy (Temporal-managed cleanup).
A telematics-driven backend for managing Electric 3-Wheeler fleets and their modular battery swapping cycles across urban stations.

contract for communication with (mocked) swap stations. The system must process "Heartbeat" packets from vehicles; if the "State of Charge" (SoC) drops below 15%, Temporal triggers a "Reservation Workflow" at the nearest station with an available, 100% charged battery.
Implement "Battery Lease" logic where drivers are billed per swap or per km, whichever is higher.
"Thermal Runaway Alert"—if mock IoT data shows battery temp > 60°C, the system must send an immediate "Remote Kill" command and alert the fire safety team.
Prevent swapping if the driver has an outstanding "Daily Lease" balance > ₹500.
A specialized fintech support engine for managing UPI transaction failures and "Chargeback" workflows as per NPCI UBAR guidelines.
state machine. Every ticket must link to a
(Retrieval Reference Number). Temporal must enforce "Regulatory Timelines"—T+48 hours for "Auto-Reversal" and T+7 days for "Adjudication".
, the system must trigger an auto-refund via a mock
Handle "Circular Disputes" where both the sender and receiver claim the same amount.
Audit logs must be "WORM" (Write Once Read Many) to comply with financial audits, stored in Cloud Storage.
A high-velocity onboarding system for 10,000+ monthly delivery partners including automated background verification (BGV).
Implement a "Progressive Onboarding" flow: Aadhaar OCR -> DL Verification -> Training Video -> Kit Handover. Use
(mocked) for fetching verified documents. Temporal must manage the "Nudge Cycle"—if a candidate drops off at the "Selfie-Verification" stage, send a WhatsApp nudge (mocked) every 4 hours for 2 days.
"Blacklist Check"—cross-reference new applicants against a database of previously terminated riders using PAN/Aadhaar hashes.
Store high-res document scans in Cloud Storage with "Signed URLs" that expire in 10 minutes.
Handle "Re-onboarding" for seasonal workers with a skipped training module if they worked in the last 6 months.
A batch-level inventory system for temperature-sensitive medications with strict FEFO (First-Expiry-First-Out) and HSN logic.
Must manage "Multi-Stage Warehousing" (CFA -> Stockist -> Retailer). Implement
scanning logic (mocked). Temporal must monitor "Temperature Log" mocks; if a batch's cold-chain is broken (temp > 8°C for 20 mins), all units in that batch must be "System Locked" for sale.
GST must handle "Scheme Discounts" (e.g., 10+2 free) where the tax is still calculated on the adjusted base price.
Prevent "Inter-state Transfer" of controlled substances without a specific "Form 24" digital upload.
"Batch Recall"—one command must identify every customer who bought from a specific batch and trigger SMS alerts.
A backend for state-run transport corporations to manage inter-city bus and metro ticketing with "Dynamic Surge" pricing.

standard for stored-value wallets. Temporal should handle "Ticket Expiry"—if a digital QR code isn't scanned within 30 minutes of the bus's scheduled departure, the ticket is auto-cancelled with a 20% refund.
Implement "Load-based Surge"—if a bus route is >80% booked, increase the remaining seat prices by 1.5x.
Prevent "Over-allocation" during high-concurrency (e.g., Diwali bookings) using SQLAlchemy pessimistic locking.
Mock a "GPS Gateway" to provide real-time bus locations for the "Live Tracking" feature.
An industrial expense auditor for construction sites that validates GSTINs and maps expenses to site-specific budget heads.
to validate that the vendor's GST is "Active". Temporal must manage the "Approval Hierarchy"—Site Supervisor (<₹5k) -> Project Manager (<₹50k) -> CFO (>₹50k).
"Budget-Hard-Stop"—if the "Cement" budget for "Project A" is exhausted, the system must block further payouts even if approved.
OCR-ready storage—save receipts in Cloud Storage with metadata for
A portal for government-mandated CSR (Corporate Social Responsibility) training, focusing on rural youth certification.
Implement "Biometric-linked Attendance" (mocked API). Temporal must orchestrate the "Course Journey"—users cannot unlock "Module 3" until "Module 2" video is watched 100% and a quiz is passed.
Credits are only awarded if the user stays active for 80% of the video duration (checked via heartbeats).
Generate "Skill India" branded certificates as PDFs in Cloud Storage.
Course access is geo-restricted to "Aspirational Districts" (as defined by NITI Aayog).
A B2B platform for developers to manage property sales where payments are strictly tied to RERA construction milestones.

System must manage "Payment Milestones" (e.g., 10% on Plinth, 20% on 5th Floor). Temporal must manage "Demand Notes"—when a "Construction Milestone" is marked complete by an auditor, auto-generate demand letters for all 200+ flat buyers.
Implement "Delayed Payment Interest" (as per RERA, e.g., SBI MCLR + 2%).
A flat cannot be marked "Sold" unless the 10% "Booking Amount" is confirmed via a mock Payment Gateway.
Storage of "Encumbrance Certificates" and "Sale Deeds" with versioning in Cloud Storage.
A corporate health platform where employee physical activity reduces the company’s group insurance premium.
for daily steps and heart rate. Temporal must manage "Weekly Challenges"—if a team of 5 completes 50,000 steps, they unlock a "Premium Discount" for the next month.
"Anomaly Detection"—flag accounts that show 10,000 steps in 10 minutes (anti-cheating).
Provide a "Manager Dashboard" showing anonymized "Departmental Health Scores" without leaking individual PII.
A specialized digital library for a law firm to manage litigation documents, case laws, and billable research time.

System must link every "Document Search" to a "Client Matter ID" for billing. Temporal should manage "Retention Sprints"—legal documents must be "Sealed" (moved to cold storage) 3 years after a case is closed.
Implement "Conflict Check"—if a lawyer is searching for files on "Company A", they should be restricted from files on "Company B" if they are opposing parties.
Document "Check-out" system where only one associate can "Edit" a draft SOP at a time.
A specialized booking system for "Religious Circuits" (e.g., Char Dham) managing multiple stays and transport in one bundle.

System must handle "Circuit Logic"—if the first hotel in the 4-city chain is cancelled, the entire itinerary must be re-evaluated. Temporal must manage the "Waitlist Priority"—if a room opens in a "Sold Out" peak period (e.g., Kumbh Mela), it must be offered to the user who has been waiting longest and has the highest "Loyalty Score".
Implement "Dynamic Price Caps" mandated by local government during festival dates.
; if a landslide is reported (mocked event), Temporal triggers mass cancellations and auto-refunds.
A 21 CFR Part 11 compliant CMS for pharmaceutical manufacturing plants to manage "Standard Operating Procedures" (SOPs).
Every document "Read" must be logged with a timestamp and UserID for "Compliance Audit". Implement "Multi-stage Approval"—SOPs must be signed by
. Temporal must manage "Revision Alerts"—every SOP must be reviewed every 365 days or it becomes "Invalid".
PDF versions must be stored in Cloud Storage with "Audit-Trail" sidecar files.
"Emergency Access"—allowing a worker to view an SOP during a "Plant Breakdown" without the usual training-prerequisite check.
A high-stakes feedback system for car dealerships where "Negative Sentiment" triggers an immediate factory-level escalation.
System must ingest feedback from SMS, Email, and IVR (all mocked). Use a 3rd party
contract (mocked) to score comments. Temporal must manage the "Service Recovery" workflow—if NPS < 4, a "District Manager" must acknowledge the ticket in 2 hours or it escalates to "National Head".
"Survey Throttling"—do not survey the same VIN (Vehicle Identification Number) more than once in 90 days.
Tie "Dealer Payouts" to their monthly aggregate NPS score.
A subscription engine for apartment complexes (RWAs) to manage maintenance, EV charging, and clubhouse facilities.
Implement "Metered Billing" for EV chargers—monthly bills are
. Temporal must manage the "Grace Period"—if a maintenance bill is unpaid by the 10th, send a "Gate Pass Restriction" command to the (mocked) IoT security system.
Support "Pro-rated Refunds" for residents moving out mid-month.
Handle "Bulk Discounts" where the RWA offers 5% off if 80% of a block pays within 3 days.
A mission-critical delivery system where food is mapped to a patient's medical condition (HIS-linked).
to check patient allergies. Temporal must manage "Meal Windows"—if a diabetic patient's meal is delayed by >30 mins, it triggers a "Medical Risk" alert to the nursing station.
"Menu Filtering"—if a patient is marked for "Surgery Tomorrow", the "Order Food" button is disabled.
Delivery staff must scan a "Bed-side QR Code" to confirm the right meal reached the right patient.
Keep meal-logs for 3 years in Cloud Storage for medical-legal audits.
A geo-targeted notification engine for disaster management (Cyclones/Floods) with 99.999% delivery reliability.
System must handle "Priority Pre-emption"—Disaster alerts must jump to the front of the queue, pausing all "Marketing/General" notifications. Integrate with (mocked)
. Temporal must handle "Feedback Loops"—if an SMS fails, immediately try a "Voice Call" (mocked IVR).
"Geo-fencing"—send alerts only to users whose last known GPS coordinates (mocked) are within the "Red Zone".
Handle 1 million notifications in a 5-minute window during a mock "Cyclone Drill".
A secure document locker for home-loan providers to manage "Original Title Deeds" and "Encumbrance Certificates".

Implement "Chain of Custody"—every time a digital file is "Viewed", "Downloaded", or "Shared", a permanent audit entry is made. Use Temporal to manage "Lien Release"—when a loan is marked "Closed" in the (mocked) Core Banking System, Temporal must wait for a "Senior Manager" approval to release the documents back to the customer.
Multi-factor "File Encryption"—files in Cloud Storage must be encrypted with a key that requires two separate user-shards to unlock.
"Court Subpoena"—a workflow to "Lock" a document folder from even the owners.

Here are 10 new backend project ideas. These are designed to be more accessible for interns while maintaining enough "business density" and "rule-based constraints" to ensure they can't be solved by a single simple AI prompt.
I have focused on industries with well-documented API patterns (like Razorpay for payments, Twilio for SMS, or Google Maps for distance) which you can ask the interns to mock.
A specialized rental engine for student housing in Indian education hubs like Kota or Pune, managing room allocations, roommates, and mess bills.

The system must manage "Bed-Level Inventory" rather than just rooms. Implement "Roommate Matching" logic based on shared preferences (e.g., Veg/Non-Veg, Year of Study). Temporal must handle the "Onboarding Workflow": Deposit Payment -> Document Upload (Aadhaar/College ID to Cloud Storage) -> Digital Agreement Signing.
Implement "Prorated Rent" for mid-month move-ins and "Late Fee Accumulation" (₹100/day after the 5th).
Handle "Room Swaps" where balances must be transferred between room types.
for monthly rent collection and a
for sending the rent receipt PDF.
A service marketplace for pet parents in Tier-1 cities to book home-based grooming and veterinary consultations.

System must manage "Service Areas" via pin-codes; bookings are only allowed if a "Groomer" is active in that zone. Implement "Breed-Specific Duration" logic (e.g., a Golden Retriever grooming takes 120 mins, a Beagle takes 45 mins). Temporal must manage "Slot Expiry"—if a groomer doesn't "Accept" within 15 minutes, the booking must fail-over to the next closest pro.
Prevent back-to-back bookings without a 30-minute "Travel Buffer."
"Aggressive Pet" flags—if a pet is marked aggressive, the system must only assign "Senior Pros."
to calculate travel time between two home visits.
A specialized marketplace for Indian artisans to sell fragile, high-value crafts with milestone-based seller payouts.

Implement a "Dual-Approval" workflow for product listings—Artisan uploads photos to Cloud Storage, and a "Curator" must approve quality/pricing. Business logic must handle "Fragile Shipping Insurance" calculations based on item value. Temporal must manage the "Payout Escrow"—funds are held and only released to the artisan 7 days after the "Delivery Confirmed" webhook (mocked).
Artisans can set "Vacation Mode" which hides their shop but keeps existing orders active.
"Damaged on Arrival"—requires a photo upload within 2 hours of delivery for a refund trigger.
for generating tracking IDs and shipping labels.
A short-burst rental backend for electric scooters parked at metro stations for last-mile urban commuting.
System must handle "Ride Sessions" with per-minute billing. Implement "Geo-fencing"—if the scooter (mocked IoT data) leaves a 5km radius, the system must trigger a "Warning SMS" via Temporal.
"Security Deposit" logic—₹500 is blocked on the wallet and released only if the scooter is returned to a designated "Metro Hub."
Scooter cannot be unlocked if the "Battery SoC" (mocked) is below 20%.
"Ride Pause"—users can pause a ride for 10 mins at a lower rate.
to send "Low Battery" or "Out of Bounds" push notifications.
An internal resource manager for large companies to track physical laptops, books, and digital licenses across multiple offices.

System must manage "Asset State": Available, Checked-out, Under-Repair, or Retired. Implement "Auto-Recovery" logic—if a laptop isn't returned within 3 days of an employee's "Last Working Day" (fetched from mock HRMS), Temporal triggers an escalation to IT.
Support "Waitlist Reservations"—if a popular book is returned, the first person on the waitlist gets a 2-hour window to claim it.
Limit of 3 physical assets per employee.
"Asset Damage Report"—employees must upload a photo to Cloud Storage to initiate a repair workflow.
to notify employees when their reserved asset is ready.
A monthly subscription service delivering healthy, regional Indian snacks to office workers based on dietary profiles.

Implement "Subscription Tiers" (Weekly/Monthly) and "Dietary Filters" (Gluten-free, High-Protein, No-Sugar). Temporal must manage the "Renewal Cycle"—on the 25th of every month, charge the card (mocked) and create the "Packing List."
Users can "Skip a Month" or "Swap a Box" if done before the 20th.
Check inventory levels before confirming a "Custom Box" swap.
"Failed Payment Recovery"—Temporal should retry the payment 3 times over 3 days before marking the subscription "Paused."
A lunch-subscription backend for office complexes allowing employees to pre-order meals from multiple in-house vendors.

System must handle "Pre-order Windows"—lunch must be ordered by 10:30 AM for 1:00 PM delivery. Implement "Payroll Integration"—meal costs are deducted from a "Monthly Credit" balance. Temporal must manage "Order Aggregation"—at 10:31 AM, send a "Bulk Prep List" to each vendor.
Vendors have a "Daily Capacity" (e.g., only 50 Biryanis); once hit, the item must auto-disable.
"Meeting Cancellations"—allow bulk cancellation of 10+ meals with a 1-hour notice.
to send a "Your Meal is Ready" QR code to the employee.
A movie ticketing backend that synchronizes seat bookings with "Pre-ordered Popcorn" combos and loyalty points.

System must manage "Real-time Seat Locking"—a seat is held for 5 minutes during the checkout process using a TTL cache. Implement "Combo-Deals"—buying 2 tickets triggers a 20% discount on "Large Popcorn." Temporal must manage the "Concession Timing"—a notification is sent to the kitchen 10 minutes before the "Interval" of the specific movie show.
Prevent "Single Seat Gaps" in the seating layout (standard cinema rule).
"Show Cancellation"—auto-refund all 200+ tickets and notify via mock SMS.
to email a PDF ticket with a QR code.
A micro-warehouse inventory system for rapid-delivery apps, tracking shelf-life and picker efficiency.

System must manage "Shelf-Locations" (Aisle/Bin) to optimize "Picking Routes." Implement "Expiry-First" logic—items with the closest expiry date must be picked first. Temporal must track "Picker SLA"—if an order isn't "Packed" in 120 seconds, alert the hub manager.
"Low Stock Trigger"—if "Milk" falls below 20 units, auto-create a "Restock Request" for the central warehouse.
"Damaged in Bin"—adjust inventory and trigger a "Cycle Count" for that SKU.
that simulates barcode scans for picking/packing.
A membership backend for a chain of fitness centers managing gym access, Personal Trainer (PT) slots, and class bookings.

System must manage "Membership Tiers"—Silver (1 branch), Gold (All branches). Implement "PT Slot Booking"—trainers set their availability, and clients book 1-hour slots. Temporal must manage "No-Show Penalties"—if a client doesn't "Check-in" (mocked IoT gate) within 15 mins of a PT slot, the session is marked "Consumed."
"Trainer Sick Leave"—Temporal must notify all 10 booked clients and offer an "Auto-Reschedule" option.
for workout reminders and membership expiry alerts.
